mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FOOD_CLASSIFY WHERE id = #{id} AND openid = #{openid}
mapper.select: SELECT count(0) FROM FOOD_CLASSIFY WHERE openid = #{openid} AND classify_name = #{classify_name}
